+heavy_description: The addition of chain mail, metal plates, a metal helm
a_blade_or_two_description: Perhaps you carry a butterfly knife. Or a big military-issue combat knife. Or a heavy butcher’s cleaver. Or a machete.
a_large_weapon_description: A broad, heavy blade with a plasmoleum-powered device built into the hilt. If the sharpened edge doesn’t finish them, the explosive release of electricity will.
handcannon_description: A heavy, large-bore handgun that hits like a sledgehammer. Loud. Slow to reload.
pumpaction_alleygun_description: A simple but very effective firearm that delivers blasts of shot over short distances. Developed for use in the narrow streets and cramped alleyways of modern cities.
paranormal_implements_description: A resonance gauge for monitoring resonance field activity. Infrared thermometer. Echo frequency scanner. A spirit anchor in the form a small crystal. A pouch of black salt. A vial of electroplasm, designed to break and splatter on impact. A portable echo containment unit. Spectral Disruptor.
armor_description: Layers of impact-resistant fabric combined with areas of rigid plate. Bulky and uncomfortable, but offers unparalleled protection.
attune_description: Attune to spirits and the ghost field; channel electroplasmic energy; perceive and communicate with ghosts; understand spectrology.
autofill_reminder_crew: To generate crew abilities, upgrades, contacts, and claims, enter the name of the crew type above:
autofill_reminder_playbook: To generate playbook abilities, items, and friends, enter the name of the playbook above:
background_info: ACADEMIC / LABOR / NOBLE / MILITARY / PROFESSIONAL / UNDERWORLD
bolster: Bolster your crew's reputation or develop a new one.
burglary_gear_description: A set of lockpicks. A small pry-bar. Cannister of lubricant to silence squeaky hinges. A spool of high-tensile wire and a set of powerful magnets. A small pouch of fine sand. A glasscutter.
chat_image: Image to show alongside chat rolls
claim_above_the_law_description:

if Citizens faction
status is +3
claim_ancient_gate_description: Safe passage out of the Bubble
claim_the_obelisk_description: -1 stress cost for all paranormal powers / rituals
claim_ancient_tower_description: +1d to Consort w/ resonance entities on site
claim_catacombs_description:
+1d to Study or
Tinker on site
claim_cover_identities_description: +1d engagement for deception and social approaches
claim_defiant_citizens_description:
Large gang who
will fight for you
claim_doskvol's_most_wanted_description:
+2 rep on scores
against the law
claim_convoy_description: Your cohorts have their own vehicles
claim_hagfish_farm_description: Body disposal,+1d to reduce heat after killing
claim_hidden_paths_description:
+1d to Prowl back
to your lair
claim_interview_room_description: +1d to Command and Sway on site
claim_luxury_venue_description: +1d to Consort and Sway on site
claim_local_graft_description:
+2 coin for
show of force or
socialize
claim_lookouts_description:
+1d to Survey or
Hunt on your turf
claim_luxury_fence_description: +2 stacks for art or jewellery heists
claim_shadowy_fixer_description: +2 stacks for bank or intel heists
claim_sanctuary_description:
+1d to Command
and Sway on site
claim_meeting_hall_description: +1d to Command and Sway on site
claim_temple_description: +1d to Command and Sway on site
claim_surplus_caches_description:
+2 coin for product
sale or supply
claim_tavern_description:
+1d to Consort

claim_turf_dealers_description: 1 unit can be moved for 1 stack in down-time (take 1 heat)
claim_turf_description: Expand hunting grounds and add new preferred operation
claim_turf_racers_description: Expand local circuit and add new preferred operation
claim_secret_caches_description: Stockpiles give you +1d to acquire assets
claim_warehouse_description: Stockpiles give you +1d to acquire assets
claim_legendary_target_description: Tier V target, 15 rep, 10 stacks (one-off opportunity)
claim_double_contract_description: Legendary Target includes second hit, for +10 bonus stacks
claim_elusive_target_description: Tier IV target, +5 bonus rep (one-off opportunity)
claim_clock_the_routine_description: 2 free flashbacks during Legendary Target score
claim_critical_strike_description: Tier V target, target drops 2 Tiers
claim_catalyst_action_description: Tier IV target, creates new Tier II faction (+2 status)
claim_grassroot_support_description: New faction from Catalyst Action will be +3 status
claim_inside_mark_description: Target for the Big Score counts as -1 Tier for that score
claim_double_jackpot_description: Two birds, one stone. The Big Score earns +10 bonus stacks
claim_reality_shift_description: Tier IV target, creates new anomaly (one-off opportunity)
claim_notable_skeptic_description: Successful Reality Tear score includes +4 rep
claim_reality_tear_description: Tier V target, creates new mega anomaly
claim_interested_party_description: Reality Tear score includes +6 bonus stacks
claim_local_supplier_description: Once per downtime, take 1 heat to gain 1 unit
claim_smuggler_description: Once per downtime, take 1 heat to gain 2 units
claim_manufacturer_description: Once per downtime, take 1 heat to gain 2 units
claim_airship_description: Once per downtime, take 1 heat to gain 3 units
claim_local_fiends_description: All turf generates +1 stack when moving units
claim_citywide_description: All turf generates +1 stack when moving units
claim_luxury_venue2_description: +1d to Consort and Sway on site, +2 stacks for social intrigue
claim_key_influencer_description: All turf generates +1 stack when moving units
claim_vip_clients_description: All turf generates +1 stack when moving units
claim_branding_description: +1d engagement for social plans, +2 stacks for bulk sale or supply
claim_money_laundering_description: Take -3 heat from gaining/moving units, every downtime
claim_monopoly_description: Tier V target, all Turf can move 2 units per downtime
claim_secret_hit_description: Kill a target during Deathlands Race for +5 bonus stacks
claim_bets_placed_description: +5 bonus stacks for the Deathlands Race
climbing_gear_description: A large coil of nylon rope. Grappling hooks. A small pouch of chalk dust. A climbing harness with loops and carabiners. A set of steel pitons and a small mallet. Suction cups.
command_description: Command obedience with your force of personality; intimidate or threaten; lead an action with one of the crew's gangs.
consort_description: Consort with connections from your heritage, background, friends, or rivals to gain access to resources, information, people, or places.
crew_ability_accord_description: Sometimes friends are as good as territory. You may count up to three +3 faction statuses you hold as if they are turf.
crew_ability_all_hands_description: During downtime, one of your cohorts may perform a downtime activity for the crew to acquire an asset, reduce heat, or work on a long-term project.
crew_ability_anointed_description: You get +1d to resistance rolls against supernatural threats. You get +1d to healing rolls when you have supernatural harm.
crew_ability_as_good_as_your_word_descri: You may spend rep as coin in downtime actions. Vigilantes gain Obligation as a second vice.
crew_ability_avengers_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Hunt, Prowl, or Command (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_blood_brothers_description: When you fight alongside your cohorts in combat, they get +1d for teamwork rolls (setup and group actions). All of your cohorts get the thugs type for free (if they're already thugs, add another type).
crew_ability_bound_in_darkness_descripti: You may use teamwork with any cult member, regardless of the distance separating you. By taking 1 stress, your whispered message is heard by every cultist.
crew_ability_chosen_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Attune, Study, or Sway (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_conviction_description: Each PC gains an additional Vice: Worship. When you indulge this vice and bring a pleasing sacrifice, you don't overindulge if you clear excess stress. In addition, your deity will assist any one action roll you make — from now until you indulge this vice again.
crew_ability_crow's_veil_description: Due to hard-won experience or occult ritual, your activities are hidden from the notice of the death-seeker crows. You don't take extra heat when killing is involved on a score.
crew_ability_dangerous_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Hunt, Skirmish, or Wreck (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_deadly_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Hunt, Prowl, or Skirmish (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_door_kickers_description: When you execute an assault plan, take +1d to the engagement roll.
crew_ability_emberdeath_description: Due to hard-won experience or occult ritual, you know the arcane method to destroy a living victim's spirit at the moment you kill them. Take 3 stress to channel electroplasmic energy from the ghost field to disintegrate the spirit and dead body in a shower of sparking embers.
crew_ability_everyone_steals_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Prowl, Finesse, or Wrench (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_favors_description: Spend one rep and describe how one of your contacts is put out to help you. Everyone in your crew gets one dot in an action your contact is skilled in for this score.
crew_ability_fiends_description: Fear is as good as respect. You may count each wanted level as if it was turf.
crew_ability_forged_in_the_fire_descript: Each PC has been toughened by cruel experience. You get +1d to resistance rolls.
crew_ability_ghost_echoes_description: From weird experience or occult ritual, all crew members gain the ability to see and interact with the ghostly structures, streets, and objects within the echo of Doskvol that exists in the ghost field.
crew_ability_ghost_market_description: Through arcane ritual or hard-won experience, you have discovered how to prepare your product for sale to ghosts and/or demons. They do not pay in coin. What do they pay with?
crew_ability_ghost_passage_description: From harsh experience or occult ritual, all crew members become immune to possession by spirits, but may choose to "carry" a second ghost as a passenger within their body.
crew_ability_glory_incarnate_description: Your deity sometimes manifests in the physical world. This can be a great boon, but the priorities and values of a god are not those of mortals. You have been warned.
crew_ability_high_society_description: It's all about who you know. Take -1 heat during downtime and +1d to gather info about the city's elite.
crew_ability_hooked_description: Your gang members use your product. Add the savage, unreliable, or wild flaw to your gangs to give them +1 quality.
crew_ability_just_passing_through_descri: During downtime, take -1 heat. When your heat is 4 or less, you get +1d to deceive people when you pass yourselves off as ordinary citizens.
crew_ability_leverage_description: Your crew supplies contraband for other factions. Your success is good for them. Whenever you gain rep, gain +1 rep.
crew_ability_like_part_of_the_family_des: Create one of your vehicles as a cohort (use the vehicle edges and flaws, below). Its quality is equal to your Tier +1.
crew_ability_misdirection_description: At the end of a score, you may sacrifice half the rep gained to make another faction lose status with your target instead of your crew. How do you pin it on someone else?
crew_ability_moral_compass_description: Each PC gains an additional xp trigger: You fulfilled an obligation at a cost to you or the crew.
crew_ability_no_traces_description: When you keep an operation quiet or make it look like an accident, you get half the rep value of the target (round up) instead of zero. When you end downtime with zero heat, take +1 rep.
crew_ability_pack_rats_description: Your lair is a jumble of stolen items. When you roll to acquire an asset, take +1d.
crew_ability_patron_description: When you advance your Tier, it costs half the coin it normally would. Who is your patron? Why do they help you?
crew_ability_predators_description: When you use stealth or subterfuge to commit murder, take +1d to the engagement roll.
crew_ability_reavers_description: When you go into conflict aboard a vehicle, you gain +1 effect for vehicle damage and speed. Your vehicle gains armor.
crew_ability_renegades_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Finesse, Prowl, or Skirmish (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_roots_description: During downtime one of your contacts or cohorts may take a downtime action to acquire an asset, reduce heat, or recover.
crew_ability_sealed_in_blood_description: Each human sacrifice yields -3 stress cost for any ritual you perform.
crew_ability_second_story_description: When you execute a clandestine infiltration, you get +1d to the engagement roll.
crew_ability_silver_tongues_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Command, Consort, or Sway (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_slippery_description: When you roll entanglements, roll twice and keep the one you want. When you reduce heat on the crew, take +1d.
crew_ability_synchronized_description: When you perform a group action, you may count multiple 6s from different rolls as a critical success.
crew_ability_the_good_stuff_description: Your merchandise is exquisite. The product quality is equal to your Tier+2. When you deal with a crew or faction, the GM will tell you who among them is hooked on your product (one, a few, many, or all).
crew_ability_thorn_in_your_side_descript: When you use Stealth or Assault plans against a higher Tier faction, your Tier counts as +1.
crew_ability_uncanny_preparation_descrip: Twice per session during a Desperate action, improve your effect or position. Describe a flashback that gives you the advantage now (setup action).
crew_ability_versatile_description: Choose a special ability from another crew (can be taken more than once).
crew_ability_vipers_description: When you acquire or craft poisons, you get +1 result level to your roll. When you employ a poison, you are specially prepared to be immune to its effects.
crew_ability_war_dogs_description: When you’re at war (-3 faction status), your crew does not suffer -1 hold and PCs still get two downtime activities, instead of just one.
crew_ability_zealotry_description: Your cohorts have abandoned their reason to devote themselves to the cult. They will undertake any service, no matter how dangerous or strange. They gain +1d to rolls against enemies of the faith.
crew_hit_squad_description: Contract Killers - Discreet And Skilled Assassins
crew_hit_squad_hunting_grounds_descripti: Preferred Operations: Accident — Disappearance — Murder — Ransom
crew_hit_squad_hunting_grounds_blurb: Get +1d to gather information rolls and free downtime activity for preferred operations in your hunting grounds
crew_hit_squad_xp_condition: Execute a successful accident, disappearance, murder, or ransom operation.
crew_militants_hunting_grounds_descripti: Preferred Operations: Assassination / Demonstration / Sabotage / Battle
crew_militants_hunting_grounds_blurb: Get +1d to gather information rolls and free downtime activity for preferred operations against enemies of the cause
crew_militants_xp_condition: A successful assassination, demonstration, sabotage or battle operation.
crew_utopians_description: ESOTERIC BELIEVERS USHERING IN AN UNSETTLING VISION
crew_utopians_hunting_grounds_blurb: Get +1d to gather information rolls and a free downtime activity for operations that involve any of the above
crew_utopians_xp_condition: Advancing the realization of your utopian vision.
crew_dealers_description: Pushers Who Acquire And Sell Illegal Product
crew_dealers_hunting_grounds_description: Preferred Operations: Show Of Force / Social Intrigue / Bulk Acquisition / Bulk Sale
crew_dealers_hunting_grounds_blurb: Get +1d to gather information rolls and free downtime activity for preferred operations in your sales territory. You can use your sales territory to move 1 unit of product for 1 stack during downtime (take 1 heat).
crew_dealers_xp_condition: Successful bulk sale or acquisition, show of force, or socialize operation.
crew_heist_team_description: Expert Thieves Who Execute Elaborate Crimes
crew_heist_team_hunting_grounds_descript: Preferred Operations: Bank Heists / Art Heists / Intel Heists / Jewellery Heists
crew_heist_team_hunting_grounds_blurb: Get +1d to gather information rolls and a free downtime activity for preferred operations in your hunting grounds
crew_heist_team_xp_condition: A successful bank heist, art heist, intel heist or jewellery heist.
crew_racers_hunting_grounds_description: Preferred Operations: Smuggling / Hijacking / Racing / Hot Pursuit
crew_racers_hunting_grounds_blurb: Get +1d to gather information rolls and free downtime activity for preferred operations that start in your local circuit
crew_racers_xp_condition: Execute a successful smuggling, hijacking, racing, or hot pursuit operation.
crew_upgrade_assassin_rigging: Assassin rigging (2 free load of weapons or gear)
crew_upgrade_militant_rigging: Militant rigging (2 free load of weapons or armor)
crew_upgrade_camouflage: Camouflage (vehicles are very well concealed at rest)
crew_upgrade_utopians_rigging: Utopian rigging (2 free load of documents or implements)
crew_upgrade_dealers_rigging: Dealer's rigging (1 carried item is concealed and has no load)
crew_upgrade_smuggler's_rigging: Smuggler's rigging (2 items carried are perfectly concealed)
crew_upgrade_heist_rigging: Heist rigging (2 free load of tools or gear)
crew_upgrade_underground_maps_&_passkeys: Secret maps, and various keys and passcards
crew_upgrade_vigilantes_attire: Vigilantes attire (2 free load of weapons or supplies)
crew_vigilantes_xp_condition: Interfere with criminal scores, protect citizens, or antagonize the law.
deity_features_info: Alluring — Cruel — Ferocious — Monstrous — Radiant — Sinister — Serene — Transcendent
demolition_tools_description: A heavy drill. Crowbar. Explosive putty and blasting caps. Thermite charges. Vials of acid. A sledgehammer. A blowtorch.
documents_description: A folder of paperwork on a variety of topics, including a registry of the nobility, bluecoat commanders, and other notable citizens. Blank pages, a pen. A number of interesting maps. Some relevant print-outs of archival information, prepared before the score.
express_crew: Express the goals, drives, inner conflict, or essential nature of the crew.
faction_bluecoats_notes: The City Watch of Duskwall, tasked with upholding the law. Decades of PR have rebranded them as your friendly local constables, but they are still just as corrupt, violent, and cruel as ever.
faction_cabbies_notes: Autopod taxi drivers. An impressive gossip network.
faction_city_council_notes: The elected rulers of the city government. Mostly aristocrats and nobles.
faction_gondoliers_notes: Most boats are now automated, but a handful of old gondoliers still work the canals. Said to know forgotten secrets of the dark.
faction_imperial_military_notes: Although the  Age of Consensus is a “time of peace”, the Imperium is always at war. Garrisons are posted at Gaddoc Monorail Station, aboard the naval destroyer Nightcastle, and at the Premiere’s stronghold (about 1000 troops in total). The military also runs a training camp east of Doskvol for fresh conscripts, along with a prison for draft-dodgers and deserters.
faction_inspectors_notes: The criminal investigators of the City Watch. They have a reputation for ethics and integrity (no one likes them). They present evidence for prosecutions to the city magistrates.
faction_ironhook_prison_notes: A rusting relic of centuries past, where many scoundrels spend the bulk of their lives. In danger of being replaced by the Lusk Reform Technique.
faction_lord_scurlock_notes: An old recluse. Possibly a vampire. Obsessed with paranormal secrets.
faction_the_rail_jacks_notes: The remnants of the former union of ghostlands train guards, who turned to crime when their services were replaced by robotic hulls. Paranormal specialists and underworld muscle for hire.
faction_the_unseen_notes: A highly organized and powerful group with secret membership. Thought to pull the strings of most of Doskvol.
faction_scorpion_syndicate_notes: A massive and sophisticated Severosi drug-smuggling operation, mainly dealing in black lotus.
faction_strangford_michter_notes: A powerful investment firm with a habit of backing illegal ventures off the books. Has stakes in a large number of criminal groups and shady scientific projects.
faction_mirror_house_notes: Rogue scientists dedicated to the discovery and exploitation of metaphysical anomalies.
faction_the_golden_hand_notes: A high-tech criminal organisation, known for using gold-plated hulls to do its dirty work.
faction_the_tomorrow_program_notes: A hedonistic association of notable scientists, writers, artists, performers and dreamers. Lots of parties. Cover for extortion, graft, and murder.
faction_red_torque_notes: A tight-knit gang of elite racing drivers who use their skills for criminal ends. Ambitious, angry, and fast.
faction_silk_notes: A mysterious and legendary cat burglar, or possibly several of them. Every heist more ambitious than the last. Enjoys stealing the score from lesser thieves at the last moment.
faction_the_burn_corps_notes: The radical militant arm of Burning Orange, the Severosi social activism collective. The Burn Corps is dedicated to armed self-defence, particularly against bluecoat brutality.
faction_the_gallo_family_notes: A tight-knit criminal enterprise with deep roots in Silkshore. Gambling, loan sharking, and narcotics trafficking.
faction_the_keel_twins_notes: Identical twin sisters, ruthless gangsters, and minor nightlife celebrities. Many smaller gangs pay up to the Keels.
faction_the_limmerfield_gang_notes: A tough gang with a reputation for brutality and strangeness.
faction_the_lounge_rats_notes: A seedy group of lounge-lizards and nightclub-owners. Extortion rackets, drug-dealing, and illegal gambling.
faction_d13_notes: Ex-soldiers with no future, forced to pursue criminal opportunities.
faction_leatherbacks_notes: Rough and rowdy autocycle racers. A youth subculture as much as a gang. Named for their ubiquitous colorful leather jackets.
faction_the_mustangs_notes: A stickball team turned to crime. Team uniforms, facepaint, stickball bats.
faction_paxton_notes: A champion bare-knuckle boxer and a larger-than-life personality. Has spent more time inside Ironhook than out. Just got out on parole for the 7th time.
faction_section6_notes: Responsible for the disposal of the dead, as well as enforcing Reality Constancy Law (investigating anomalies and unlicensed paranormal experimentation).
faction_the_palace_notes: The Imperial Intelligence Agency, or I.I.A. Spends as much time neutralising internal threats to its own power as it does clashing with Blackthorn Park.
faction_ministry_of_discovery_notes: Responsible for the research, acquisition, and application of new technologies in service to the Imperium.
faction_ministry_of_stability_notes: The governmental body of the Imperium that oversees border security, transportation between cities, and the disbursement of food and other vital resources.
faction_the_church_notes: 'The Church of the Ecstasy of the Flesh', or the 'C of E'. They honor the life of the body and deem the transcendent, spiritual, or otherworldly to be heretical. Ruthless enforcers of conformity.
faction_the_strelai_notes: Counter-paranormal secret agents with mysterious motives and affiliation.
faction_blackthorn_park_notes: The foreign intelligence service of the United Skov Covenant. As Doskvol is the closest city to the border between Skovlan and Akoros, and contains a large population of Skovlanders, it’s a flashpoint in the covert war between Blackthorn Park and the Palace.
faction_burning_orange_notes: A collective of indigenous activists from Severos, with a focus on social and environmental issues.
faction_new_reform_clinic_notes: A small but well-funded facility near Ironhook Prison. Pioneers of the Lusk Reform Technique; they can turn the most violent criminal into one of the reformed (vacant-eyed hollows) and also produce a brand new hull to serve the city.
faction_anixis_field_unit_notes: Newly independent in the wake of Unity War III, Iruvia has entered an isolationist period. Their intelligence agency (Anixis) maintains a small field unit in Doskvol to monitor the other spy agencies and advance Iruvian interests where possible.
faction_the_doskvol_foundationnotes: A powerful consortium of property developers, architects, and builders. Many of their enemies have disappeared behind the brick and mortar of the city.
faction_saltfords_banking_group_notes: After a wave of consolidations and acquisitions, Saltfords has survived as the largest and most powerful bank in Doskvol.
faction_xantara_pharm_notes: A profiteering pharmaceutical company that churns out pills of every kind and flavour—Dizzy Drops, Smiletime, Go-Go Pills, you name it.
faction_ink_lane_tabloids_notes: The notorious tabloids of Doskvol; the Daily Scandal, the Evening Whisper, the Doskvol Lurker, News of the Void, and more. Buried amidst the weird and lurid trash are some surprisingly illuminating investigations.
faction_tottle_orlov_arran_notes: Advertising agency. Won the contract to create all the posters, plasomovision adverts, and radio content for the official Doskvol Citizen’s Advice Bureau (a government propaganda effort). Very well-connected.
faction_captain_laudius_blanchet_notes: Former naval officer turned celebrity Void Sea explorer, filmmaker and author. Runs the controversial (and dangerous) Void Sea Aquarium and Research Facility
faction_new_dawn_notes: A fast-growing health and wellness cult, with various circles of membership. The commitments and rituals become ever more esoteric as you advance closer to the inner circle.
faction_carousel_notes: A private research institute dedicated to finding the secret to eternal life.
faction_the_kethrys_lodge_notes: A society for those with a special interest in the paranormal. Conducts seances, experiments, and weird rituals.
faction_the_silver_echoes_notes: The most popular band in Doskvol. Detractors claim their horde of fans have been brainwashed by some combination of their electroplasmic instruments, the Resonance Field radios their music is broadcast over, and/or subliminal messages in their lyrics.
faction_the_old_northport_preservation_s: The Old North Port Preservation Society

A sect of neo-traditionalists who have reclaimed Old North Port, beyond the safety of the Bubble. They believe that lost rituals and old runes keep them safe. Traditional robes, flower-gathering, effigy-burning.
faction_deathsteaders_notes: Survivalists, fugitives, and free-thinkers who have left the safety of the Bubble to make a living in the forbidden Deathlands beyond.
faction_plasmovision_social_club_notes: Many homes now have plasmovision sets, beaming in the latest news and entertainment via the Resonance Field. Enthusiasts meet to discuss the latest shows and compare the mind-warping truths they see in the static between programs.
fill_fields: Fill in sheet fields automatically upon entering or changing playbook or crew type
finesse_description: Finesse an item from someone's pocket; employ subtle misdirection or sleight-of-hand; handle a vehicle or a mount.
flexible_width: Flexible character sheet width (adapts to container)
functions_info: to guard — to destroy — to discover — to acquire — to labor at ... that which my master commands.
gatherinfo_good_time: What’s their idea of a good time?
gatherinfo_how_can_I_blend: How can I blend in here?
gatherinfo_how_can_I_get_them: How can I get them to [X]?
gatherinfo_what_can_I_tinker: What can I tinker with here?
gatherinfo_what_do_they_intend: What do they intend to do?
gatherinfo_what_do_they_really: What do they really care about?
gatherinfo_what_drives_them: What drives them to do this?
gatherinfo_what_echoes: What echoes in the resonance field?
gatherinfo_what_is_arcane: What is paranormal or weird here?
gatherinfo_what_is_hidden: What is hidden or lost here?
gatherinfo_what_should_I_look: What should I look out for?
gatherinfo_upperhand: How can I get the upperhand?
ghost_viceblurb: You have an intense need: life essence. To satisfy this need, possess a living victim and consume their spirit energy (this may be a downtime action). When you do so, clear half your drain (round down).
heritage_info: Akoros / The Dagger Isles / Iruvia / Severos / Skovlan / Tycheros
hull_viceblurb: Your clockwork body runs on electroplasm. Recharge your capacitors by connecting to an industrial-grade generator (downtime action). When you do this, clear 5 drain.
hunt_description: Hunt a target; gather information about its location and movements; attack with precision shooting from a distance.
hunting_grounds_blurb: Get +1d to gather information rolls and free downtime activity for preferred operations in your hunting grounds
insight_description: Resist consequences from deception or understanding.
arclighter_description: A handheld tool that carries a small reserve of plasmoleum. A flick of the thumb produces a small arc of crackling energy, and with a twist of the dial it turns into a steady beam of light. Used as a flashlight, cigarette lighter, welding torch, or for anything from supercharging firearm rounds, overloading electronic systems, or even jamming into a knife’s hilt to jury-rig a quick electro-blade.
list_crews: Hit Squad, Militants, Utopians, Dealers, Heist Teameameam, Racers, or Vigilantes.
list_playbooks: Veteran, Hound, Intellectual, Radical, Swinger, Operative, Paranormalist, Hull, Ghost, or Vampire.
name: Name
planningdesc: Choose a plan, provide the opening gambit. Choose your approach (quiet or loud).
playbook_ability_a_little_something_on_t: A Little Something on the Side
At the end of each downtime phase, you earn +2 bank.
playbook_ability_a_void_in_the_echo_desc: You are invisible to spirits and may not be harmed by them. Take 2 stress to cause living things to avert their gaze and fail to observe you for a few moments.
playbook_ability_alchemist_description: When you invent or craft a creation with alchemical features, take +1 result level to your roll. You begin with one special formula already known.
playbook_ability_ambush_description: When you attack from hiding or spring a trap, you get +1d.
playbook_ability_analyst_description: During downtime, you get two ticks to distribute among any long term project clocks that involve investigation or learning a new formula or design plan.
playbook_ability_arcane_sight_descriptio: Take 1 stress to sense beyond human limits. "Hear" a subject's true thoughts or feelings, see in pitch darkness, sense the presence of invisible things, intuit the location of a hidden object, etc.
playbook_ability_artificer_description: When you invent or craft a creation with spark-craft features, take +1 result level to your roll. You begin with one special design already known.
playbook_ability_automaton_description: You are a soul powering a robotic body. You have human-like strength and senses, by default. Your hull has built-in armor (this doesn't count for your load). Your former human feelings, interests, and connections are almost entirely gone (you start with no keys). You do not have a bank. You may be repaired if damaged or destroyed. Whenever you would take stress, take drain instead. Choose two upgrades (below).
playbook_ability_battleborn_description: You may expend your special armor to reduce harm from an attack in combat or to push yourself during a fight.
playbook_ability_bodyguard_description: When you protect a teammate, take +1d to your resistance roll. When you gather info to anticipate possible threats in the current situation, you get +1 effect.
playbook_ability_calculating_description: Due to your careful planning, during downtime, you may give yourself or another crew member +1 downtime action.
playbook_ability_cloak_&_dagger_descript: When you use a disguise or other form of covert misdirection, you get +1d to rolls to confuse or deflect suspicion. When you throw off your disguise, the resulting surprise gives you the initiative in the situation.
playbook_ability_retractable_arsenal_des: Your items are built-in to your frame and may recess beneath panels out of sight. Your frame can now carry +2 load.
playbook_ability_compel_description: You can Attune to the ghost field to force a nearby ghost to appear and obey a command you give it. You are not supernaturally terrified by a ghost you summon or compel (though your allies may be).
playbook_ability_daredevil_description: When you roll a desperate action, you get +1d to your roll if you also take -1d to any resistance rolls against consequences from your action.
playbook_ability_dark_talent_description: Choose Insight, Prowess, or Resolve. Your max rating for actions under that attribute becomes 5. When you take this ability, add +1 dot to the resistance rating of the attribute you've chosen.
playbook_ability_dissipate_description: You can disperse the electroplasmic vapor of your ghostly form in order to pass through solid objects for a moment. Take 1 drain when you dissipate, plus 1 drain for each feature: It lasts longer (a minute — an hour — a day) — you also become invisible — anything that passes through your form becomes dangerously electrified or frozen.
playbook_ability_energy_beam_description: You may release some of your energy as an electrical shock around you or as a directed beam. You may also use this ability to create a lightning barrier to repel or trap a resonance entity. Take 1 drain for each level of magnitude.
playbook_ability_expertise_description: Choose one of your action ratings. When you lead a group action using that action, you can suffer only 1 stress at most regardless of the number of failed rolls.
playbook_ability_focused_description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence of surprise or mental harm (fear, confusion, losing track of someone) or to push yourself for ranged combat or tracking.
playbook_ability_foresight_description: Two times per score you can assist a teammate without paying stress. Tell us how you prepared for this.
playbook_ability_fortitude_description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence of fatigue, weakness, or chemical effects, or to push yourself when working with technical skill or handling alchemicals.
playbook_ability_frame_upgrade_descripti: Choose an additional frame feature. This upgrade may be taken up to four times.
playbook_ability_functioning_vice_descri: When you indulge your vice, you may adjust the dice outcome by 1 or 2 (up or down). An ally who joins in your vice may do the same.
playbook_ability_ghost_contract_descript: When you shake on a deal, you and your partner — human or otherwise — both bear a mark of your oath. If either breaks the contract, they take level 3 harm, "Cursed".
playbook_ability_ghost_fighter_descripti: You may imbue your hands, melee weapons, or tools with spirit energy. You gain potency in combat vs. the supernatural. You may grapple with spirits to restrain and capture them.
playbook_ability_ghost_form_description: You are now a concentration of electroplasmic vapor which resembles your living body and clothes. You may weakly interact with the physical world and vice versa. You're vulnerable to arcane powers and electroplasmic effects. You move about by floating and may fly swiftly without tiring. You may slowly flow through small openings as a vapor. You chill the area around you and are terrifying for the living to behold. You are affected by spiritbane charms (take 2 drain to overcome the repulsion). Whenever you would take stress, take drain instead. When you would take trauma, take gloom instead.
playbook_ability_ghost_hunter_descriptio: Your hunting pet is imbued with spirit energy. It gains potency when tracking or fighting the supernatural, and gains an arcane ability: ghost-form, mind-link, or arrow-swift. Take this ability again to choose an additional arcane ability for your pet.
playbook_ability_ghost_mind_description: You’re always aware of supernatural entities in your presence. Take +1d when you gather info about the supernatural.
playbook_ability_ghost_veil_description: You may shift partially into the ghost field, becoming shadowy and insubstantial for a few moments. Take 2 stress when you shift, plus 1 stress for each extra feature: It lasts for a few minutes rather than moments — you are invisible rather than shadowy — you may float through the air like a ghost
playbook_ability_ghost_voice_description: You know the secret method to interact with a ghost or demon as if it was a normal human, regardless of how wild or feral it appears. You gain potency when communicating with the supernatural.
playbook_ability_ghost_ward_description: You know how to Wreck an area with arcane substances and methods so it is either anathema or enticing to spirits (your choice).
playbook_ability_interface_description: You may attune to the local electroplasmic power field to control it or something connected to it (including another hull).
playbook_ability_iron_will_description: You're immune to the terror that some supernatural entities inflict on sight. Take +1d to resistance rolls with Resolve.
playbook_ability_jail_bird_description: When incarcerated, your wanted level counts as 1 less, your Tier as 1 more, and you gain +1 faction status with a faction you help on the inside (in addition to your incarceration roll).
playbook_ability_leader_description: When you Command a cohort in combat, they continue to fight when they would otherwise break (they're not taken out when they suffer level 3 harm). They gain +1 effect and 1 armor.
playbook_ability_like_looking_into_a_mir: You can always tell when someone is lying to you.
playbook_ability_manifest_description: Take 1 drain to flow through the electroplasmic pathways of the ghost field in order to instantly travel to any place you knew intimately in life, or to answer the summoning call of a compel.
playbook_ability_mastermind_description: You may expend your special armor to protect a teammate, or to push yourself when you gather information or work on a long-term project.
playbook_ability_mesmerism_description: When you Sway someone, you may cause them to forget that it's happened until they next interact with you.
playbook_ability_mule_description: Your load limits are higher. Light: 5. Normal: 7. Heavy: 8.
playbook_ability_not_to_be_trifled_with_: You can push yourself to do one of the following: perform a feat of physical force that verges on the superhuman — engage a small gang on equal footing in close combat.
playbook_ability_occultist_description: You know the secret ways to Consort with ancient powers, forgotten gods or demons. Once you've consorted with one, you get +1d to command cultists who worship it.
playbook_ability_powerhouse_description: Take 1 drain to perform a feat of extreme strength or speed (run faster than an autopod, rend metal with your hands, etc). This factors into effect.
playbook_ability_physicker_description: You can Tinker with bones, blood, and bodily humours to treat wounds or stabilize the dying. You may study a malady or corpse. Everyone in your crew gets +1d to their healing treatment rolls.
playbook_ability_poltergeist_description: Take 1 drain to strongly interact with the physical world for a few moments (as if you had a normal body). Extend the reach and magnitude of your interaction to include telekinetic force and electroplasmic discharges by taking more drain (2-6).
playbook_ability_possess_description: You may attune to the ghost field in order to take control of a living body. When your control is challenged, you must re-attune (risking electroplasmic harm) or leave the body. Your control is challenged when: you consume spirit energy from the host — when arcane powers act against you — when the host's will is driven to desperation. You may easily and indefinitely possess a hull or hollow which has been ritually prepared for you (change your playbook to Hull or Vampire, respectively).
playbook_ability_reflexes_description: When there's a question about who acts first, the answer is you (two characters with Reflexes act simultaneously).
playbook_ability_ritual_description: You can Study an occult ritual (or create a new one) to summon a supernatural effect or being. You know the arcane methods to perform ritual sorcery. You begin with one ritual already learned.
playbook_ability_rook's_gambit_descripti: Take 2 stress to roll your best action rating while performing a different action. Say how you adapt your skill to this use.
playbook_ability_saboteur_description: When you Wreck, the work is much quieter than it should be and the damage is hidden from casual inspection.
playbook_ability_savage_description: When you unleash physical violence, it's especially frightening. When you Command a frightened target, take +1d.
playbook_ability_scout_description: When you gather info to locate a target, you get +1 effect. When you hide in a prepared position or use camouflage, you get +1d to rolls to avoid detection.
playbook_ability_secondary_hull_descript: Choose an additional frame and its starting feature. You may transfer your consciousness between your frames at will.
playbook_ability_shadow_description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence from detection or security measures, or to push yourself for a feat of athletics or stealth.
playbook_ability_sharpshooter_descriptio: You can push yourself to do one of the following: make a ranged attack at extreme distance beyond what’s normal for the weapon — unleash a barrage of rapid fire to suppress the enemy.
playbook_ability_sinister_guile_descript: During downtime, choose one: Get a free additional downtime activity, or take +1d to all downtime activity rolls.
playbook_ability_strange_methods_descrip: When you invent or craft a creation with arcane features, take +1 result level to your roll. You begin with one arcane design already known.
playbook_ability_subterfuge_description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence from suspicion or persuasion, or to push yourself for subterfuge.
playbook_ability_survivor_description: From hard won experience or occult ritual, you are immune to the poisonous miasma of the deathlands and are able to subsist on the strange flora and fauna there. You get +1 stress box.
playbook_ability_tempest_description: You can push yourself to do one of the following: unleash a stroke of lightning as a weapon — summon a storm in your immediate vicinity (torrential rain, roaring winds, heavy fog, chilling frost/snow, etc.).
playbook_ability_terrible_power_descript: Take 1 stress to perform a feat of superhuman strength or speed (run faster than a carriage, break stone with bare hands, leap onto the roof of a building, etc.). This factors into effect.
playbook_ability_the_devil's_footsteps_d: When you push yourself, choose one of the following additional benefits: perform a feat of athletics that verges on the superhuman — maneuver to confuse your enemies so they mistakenly attack each other.
playbook_ability_tough_as_nails_descript: Penalties from harm are one level less severe (though level 4 harm is still fatal).
playbook_ability_trust_in_me_description: You get +1d vs. a target with whom you have an intimate relationship.
playbook_ability_undead_description: You are a spirit which animates an undead body. Your trauma is maxed out. Choose four trauma conditions which reflect your vampiric nature. Arcane attacks are potent against you. If you suffer fatal harm or trauma, your undead spirit is overwhelmed. You take level 3 harm: "Incapacitated" until you feed enough to recover. If you suffer arcane harm while in this state, you are destroyed utterly. Your XP tracks are longer (you now advance more slowly). You have more stress boxes.
playbook_ability_vengeful_description: You gain an additional xp trigger: You got payback against someone who harmed you or someone you care about. If your crew helped you get payback, also mark crew xp.
playbook_ability_venomous_description: Choose a drug or poison (from your bandolier stock) to which you have become immune. You can push yourself to secrete it through your skin or saliva or exhale it as a vapor.
playbook_ability_versatile_description: Choose a special ability from another source (can be taken more than once).
playbook_ability_vigorous_description: You recover from harm faster. Permanently fill in one of your healing clock segments. Take +1d to healing treatment rolls.
playbook_ability_warded_description: You may expend your special armor to resist a supernatural consequence, or to push yourself when you deal with arcane forces.
playbook_ability_weaving_the_web_descrip: You gain +1d to Consort when you gather information on a target for a score. You get +1d to the engagement roll for that operation.
playbook_cutter_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with violence or coercion.
playbook_ghost_xp_condition: You exacted vengeance upon those whom you deem deserving.
playbook_ghost_xp_condition2: You expressed your your outrage or anger, or settled scores from your heritage or background.
playbook_ghost_xp_condition3: You struggled with issues from your need or glooms during the session.
playbook_hound_description: A Careworn Sleuth Who Won't Give Up
playbook_hound_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with talking or stubbornness.
playbook_hull_description: The Soul Of A Criminal Trapped In A Robot Body
playbook_hull_xp_condition: You obeyed orders, or addressed a challenge with cold simplicity.
playbook_leech_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with technical skill or mayhem.
playbook_lurk_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with stealth or evasion.
playbook_slide_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with deception or in influence.
playbook_spider_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with calculation or conspiracy.
playbook_vampire_description: A spirit animating an undead body
playbook_vampire_xp_condition: You displayed your dominance or slayed without mercy.
playbook_vampire_xp_condition2: You expressed your beliefs, drives, heritage, or background.
playbook_vampire_xp_condition3: You struggled with issues from your vice, traumas, or strictures during the session.
playbook_whisper_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with knowledge or arcane power.
prowess_description: Resist consequences from physical strain or injury.
prowl_description: Prowl about unseen and traverse obstacles; climb, swim, run, jump, and tumble. Ambush with close violence — a backstab, throat cutting, black-jack, etc.
query_for_consequence: Query for consequence name when resisting
recoveryblurb: Get treatment in downtime to activate your healing project clock
resist_instructions: Suffer 6 stress minus the highest die result. When you roll a critical on resistance, clear 1 stress.
resolve_description: Resist consequences from mental strain or willpower.
show_broadcast: Show broadcast buttons for sending information to chat
show_cohort_section: Show cohort section on character sheet
show_outline: Show outline for active input fields
skirmish_description: Skirmish with an opponent in close combat; assault or hold a position; brawl and wrestle.
strictures_bestial: When you suffer physical harm or overindulge your vice, your body twists into a horrific bestial form until you next feed without overindulging.
strictures_bound: Your spirit must remain in this body, or be destroyed.
strictures_forbidden: You cannot enter a private residence without permission from the owner.
strictures_repelled: Spiritbane charms can hold you at bay. (Take 2 stress to resist the repulsion.)
strictures_slumber: In downtime, you must spend one activity resting in a dark, silent place (or else suffer 3 stress).
stricturesblurb: When you gain a new vampire trait (except veteran), add a stricture.
study_description: Study a person, document, or item with close scrutiny to gather information and apply knowledge; gain a deeper understanding; do research.
subterfuge_supplies_description: A disguise kit. A selection of blank documents, ready for the forger's hand. Invisible ink. A forged ID card. Microfilm camera.
survey_description: Survey a location or situation to understand what's going on; sense trouble before it happens; gather information about opportunities or exploits.
sway_description: Sway someone with charm, logic, deception, disguise, or bluff; change attitudes or behavior with manipulation or seduction.
silenced_shooter_description: A semi-automatic handgun with a modest calibre. Quiet as a whisper.
hack_description: Wrench mechanisms to create, modify, disable, or repair; disable a trap, pick a lock, or crack a safe. Turn the many mechanical and electroplasmic devices around the city to your advantage.
hacking_tools_description: Tools and spare parts for messing with electronics and mechanisms. A wrench, drill, and spanner. Tweezers, pliers, precision screwdrivers. A soldering iron. A second wrench (even bigger). Oscilloscope, circuit tester, and heat sink. Jumper wires. Magnifying loupe.
upgrade_boat_description: You have a boat, a dock on a waterway, and a small shack to store boating supplies. A second upgrade improves the boat with armor and more cargo capacity.
upgrade_carriage_description: You have a carriage, two goats to pull it, and a stable. A second upgrade improves the carriage with armor and larger, swifter goats. Horses are very rare in Doskvol — most carriages in the city use the large Akorosian goat as their draft animal.
upgrade_gear_description: +1 quality for Burglary Gear and Climbing Gear.
upgrade_hidden_description: Your lair has a secret location and is disguised to hide it from view. If your lair is discovered, use two downtime activities and pay coin equal to your Tier to relocate it and hide it once again.
upgrade_insight_description: Earn 2 xp when training insight during downtime.
upgrade_mastery_description: Your crew has access to master level training. You may advance your PCs' action ratings to 4 (until you unlock this upgrade, PC action ratings are capped at 3). This costs four upgrade boxes to unlock.
upgrade_personal_description: Earn 2 xp when training playbook during downtime.
upgrade_prowess_description: Earn 2 xp when training prowess during downtime.
upgrade_quarters_description: Your lair includes living quarters for the crew. Without this upgrade, each PC sleeps elsewhere, and is vulnerable when they do so.
upgrade_resolve_description: Earn 2 xp when training resolve during downtime.
upgrade_secure_description: Your lair has locks, alarms, and traps to thwart intruders. A second upgrade improves the defenses to include arcane measures that work against spirits. You might roll your crew's Tier if these measures are ever put to the test, to see how well they thwart an intruder.
upgrade_tools_description: +1 quality for Demolition Tools and Tinkering Tools.
upgrade_vault_description: Your lair has a secure vault, increasing your storage capacity for coin to 8. A second upgrade increases your capacity to 16. A separate part of your vault can be used as a holding cell.
upgrade_workshop_description: Your lair has a workshop appointed with tools for tinkering and alchemy, as well as a small library of books, documents, and maps. You may accomplish long-term projects with these assets without leaving your lair.
upon_crew_advance: Upon crew advance, each PC gets Bank = Tier+2
use_kirsty: Use Kirsty font if installed (only check if you have Kirsty)
vampire_viceblurb: Your vice is life essence, consumed from a living human. Use 1 downtime activity to hunt prey and indulge your vice. Also, when you feed, erase all level 1 harm and mark 4 ticks on your healing clock. This is is the only way you can heal. How do you feed? What telltale sign do you leave on your victims?
vehicle_edges_flaws:
Vehicle Edges
Nimble: The vehicle handles easily. Consider this an assist for tricky maneuvers.
Simple: The vehicle is easy to repair. Remove all of its harm during downtime.
Sturdy: The vehicle keeps operating even when broken.

Vehicle Flaws
Costly: Thee vehicle costs 1 coin per downtime to keep in operation.
Distinct: Thee vehicle has memorable features. Take +1 heat when you use it on a score.
Finicky: The vehicle has quirks that only one person understands. When operated without them, the vehicle has -1 quality.
vice_info: Faith / Gambling / Luxury / Obligation / Pleasure / Gettin Fucked Up / Weird
vice_instructions: Clear an amount of stress equal to the highest die result. If the result of your vice roll means you clear more stress levels than you had marked, you overindulge.
warblurb1: When you're at war with any number of factions (status -3), the following penalties apply:
warblurb2: Lose 1 hold (temporarily, while the war persists). This may knock you down a Tier.
warblurb3: PCs get only one free downtime action instead of two.
warblurb5: Your claims which generate coin (vice dens, fighting pits, fences, etc.) produce only half their normal income (round down).
when_you_use_bandolier: When you use a bandolier slot, choose an explosive:
wreck_description: Wreck a place, item, or obstacle with savage force or carefully applied sabotage; breach defenses with force; create distractions and chaos.
xp_beliefs: You hit one or more of your keys.
xp_bolster: Bolster your crew's reputation or develop a new one.
xp_contend: Contend with challenges above your current station.
xp_crew_specific: Enter your crew's specific way to mark XP here.
xp_desperate: Every time you roll a desperate action or a zero-dot action, mark xp in any track (attribute or playbook).
xp_keys: Once per session when you hit a key, mark 1 xp and mark the key.
xp_express: Express the goals, drives, inner conflict, or essential nature of the crew.
xp_specific: Enter your playbook's specific way to mark XP here.
xp_specific_extra: Enter another specific way to mark XP here.
xp_top: At the end of each session, for each item below, mark 1 xp (or instead mark 2 xp if that item occurred multiple times).
xp_vice: You struggled with issues stemming from a deadlock.
zerodice: Zero Dice — take the lowest result above
playbook_veteran_description: A battered soldier returned from the front
vet_background_info: THE IRONDALE WAR / THE SEVRIN INVASION / UNITY WAR III / DAGGER ISLES PEACEKEEPING
int_background_info: HISTORY / BIOLOGY / PHILOSOPHY / SPARKCRAFT / PARANORMAL / POLITICAL SCIENCE / HARD KNOCKS
rad_background_info: BLUECOATS / LABOR CONDITIONS / BIGOTRY / INEQUALITY / HORRORS OF WAR / DISCRIMINATION
veteran_used_and_discarded_info: You have permanent damage from the war. You start with 1 deadlocked key already. You also start with the special ability Military Discipline and one more of your choice.
vet_damage_info: E.g. a notable scar, a missing eye or limb, nightmares, the shakes
vet_helps_info: E.g. a wheelchair, a prosthetic, medication
show_veteran_section: Show Veteran sections on character sheet
playbook_item_lmc_description: A military-grade firearm noted for its compact size and rapid-fire capability.
playbook_item_coilgun_description: A military-grade assault rifle with detachable magazine. Loud and devastating.
playbook_item_fine_melee_weapon_descript: The latest in military technology, an advanced electro-blade that superheats to red hot intensity. Can cut through steel. Well balanced and deadly.
playbook_item_gogo_pills_description: Xantara Pharm's finest uppers, for when you need pure, explosive energy. You'll run your mouth (what do you say that you didn't mean to?), and take the passing harm 'jittery' when they wear off (these consequences can be resisted).
playbook_item_rf_handset_description: A resonance field radio. A small handheld unit tuned to a secure frequency.
playbook_ability_military_discipline_des: Twice per score, you may use your training to eliminate harm from an attack in combat or to push yourself during a fight.
playbook_ability_got_your_back_descripti: When you protect a teammate, clear 1 stress and take +1d to any resistance rolls.
playbook_ability_echo_fighter_descriptio: Thanks to special training, you may engage enemies in combat with nothing but your mind.  You gain potency in combat vs. the paranormal. You can attempt to read people’s next intentions.
playbook_ability_leadership_description: When you Command a cohort in combat, they continue to fight when they would otherwise break (they're not taken out when they suffer level 3 harm). They gain increased effect and 1 armor.
playbook_ability_walking_arsenal_descrip: Your load limit is always 2 higher than normal (5 for a Quiet approach, 8 for Loud).  Add another gun to your load list at any time, no matter how many you’ve already used and discarded.
playbook_ability_war_machine_description: When you push yourself, you can also do one of the following: sweep and secure a large area single-handedly and without pausing — engage an improbable number of enemies in a ballet of violence.
playbook_ability_beast_description: You were subject to experimental procedures designed to increase the shelf-life of  front-line soldiers. Permanently fill in one of your healing clock segments. Take +1d to healing treatment rolls.
playbook_ability_creative_outlet_descrip: You gain a second vice; learning a new creative hobby. What is it? When you indulge this vice by going to class, add +2 to the result, and then create a new friend or rival (classmate or teacher), or develop your relationship with an existing one. These people have no criminal utility, but they might give you a ride or let you lay low at their place in a pinch. When you overindulge, one of these friends is put in danger.
playbook_veteran_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with violence or discipline.
playbook_ability_hounds_instincts_descri: When you push yourself, you can also do one of the following: try to figure out where to go next, even with zero leads — make someone stop and listen to you for a few moments, no matter how unlikely it is.
playbook_ability_learn_hard_way_descript: Whenever you take Harm, clear an amount of stress equal to the Harm Level, and it counts as a successful Gather Information roll (with a level of detail equal to the Harm Level). The GM will tell you what you learn.
playbook_ability_just_a_scratch_descript: Penalties from harm are one level less severe (though level 4 harm is still fatal).
playbook_ability_no_hard_feelings_descri: You gain potency when you Consort with someone who has caused you to mark Harm.
playbook_ability_in_too_deep_description: Once per score, you can Consort with an NPC to form an intimate bond. If you have such a bond with someone involved in a score, you get +1d and potency to any actions dealing with them. If they suffer due to the outcome of the score, take 3 stress.
playbook_ability_weird_pet_description: Your pet is imbued with anomalous resonance. It gains potency when tracking or fighting the paranormal, and gains a paranormal ability: reality-phasing, mind-link, or time-looping. Take this ability again to choose an additional paranormal ability for your pet.
playbook_ability_dogged_persistence_desc: Twice per score, you may use your tenacity to resist a consequence of exhaustion or mental harm (fear, confusion, losing track of someone) or to push yourself for influencing someone or searching for clues.
playbook_item_fine_snubnosed_handcannon_: Maybe you're no great shot, but this thing packs a hell of a punch and can be concealed in a pocket.
playbook_item_loyal_clever_pet_descripti: Companion might be a better word - a hunter. They never let you down (except when they do). Did you choose them, or did they choose you?
playbook_item_binoculars_description: See distant objects with greater clarity and detail. Amazing.
playbook_item_hipflask_description: Numb pain, clean wounds, or bond with new friends. What's engraved on the outside?
playbook_item_focus_pills_description: For when you need steady hands, an alert mind, and laser-like concentration. Highly addictive; tick a 4-segment addiction clock when used (this can be resisted). If the clock fills, you no longer get any benefit from the pills but have to take them every score anyway or suffer the moderate harm 'withdrawal symptoms'. Once this harm is taken, reset the addiction clock.
housing_large: Large (room-sized computer).  More powerful, but immobile.
housing_small: Small (wristwatch, a metal orb, a tiny hull, etc).  Less powerful but highly portable.
playbook_ability_unalloyed_genius_descri: When you craft an invention, take +1 result level to your roll. Gain one free downtime action to craft inventions.
playbook_ability_mentalist_description: You can deduce trivial details about anyone. Study them to reveal a deep desire they didn’t even know they had; gain +1d and potency when acting on this information.
playbook_ability_insomniac_description: During downtime, you get two ticks to distribute among any long term project clocks that involve research, investigation or crafting.
playbook_ability_try_not_break_it: Try Not to Break It This Time
playbook_ability_try_not_break_it_descri: Any flashbacks where you gave another crew member just the right gadget before the score are free. Gain one free downtime action to craft such a gadget in a flashback.
playbook_ability_researcher_description: Twice per score, you may use your research to resist a consequence of fatigue, weakness, or resonance effects, or to push yourself when working with technical skill or handling resonance objects.
playbook_ability_anatomist_description: You can Wrench someone to treat their wounds or stabilize the dying. You may Study a sickness or corpse. Everyone in your crew gets +1d to their healing treatment rolls.
playbook_ability_deep_thinker_descriptio: When you expound upon your unique and brilliant insights, roll Study to confuse or impress a target. When you first act against those confounded by your brilliant arguments, gain potency.
playbook_ability_advanced_sparkmind_desc: Choose an additional Type, or add an Edge, or remove a Flaw.
playbook_intellectual_description: A Brilliant Engineer, Scientist And Philosopher
playbook_intellectual_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with technical skill or cleverness.
playbook_item_experimental_laser_cannon_: A plasmoleum-fueled device that generates a continuous beam of electroplasmic radiation. A dangerous and potentially unstable weapon that will incinerate pretty much anything it's pointed at.
playbook_item_sparkmind_assistant_descri: Sparkminds are a form of artificial intelligence, utilizing a matrix of circuits and chips to harness the raw intellect of a resonance entity. Where did you get yours? Did you invent it, steal it, or something else?
playbook_gadgets_description: You can create gadgets in a flashback and track their load here. If they're simple, just the flashback may be enough. More ambitious gadgets might require you spend a downtime action crafting them (additional downtime actions cost 1 stack).
playbook_ability_true_believer_descripti: Twice per score, you may use your conviction to resist a consequence of law-breaking (being arrested or hassled by bluecoats, etc) or to push yourself when working with explosives.
playbook_ability_direct_action_descripti: When you make a desperate Wreck roll with explosives, gain +1d and potency. Remember that you can trade position for effect to make almost any action desperate, if you dare.
playbook_ability_thoughts_that_breathe: Thoughts That Breathe, Words That Burn
playbook_ability_thoughts_that_breathe_d: Your poetry is particularly compelling. When you write or recite a poem to Sway, take +1d and potency.
playbook_ability_solidarity_description: You gain potency when attempting to Consort with or Sway people from cultures or backgrounds other than your own.
playbook_ability_polemicist_description: When you push yourself,  you can also do one of the following: whip a crowd into a righteous fury—make a hostile or unreasonable person listen to you for a moment.
playbook_ability_praxis_description: If you loudly and visibly destroy a symbolic target during a score, gain +2 result level to any long-term project rolls related to your revolutionary work during the following downtime.
playbook_ability_pamphleteer_description: You can publish revolutionary literature as a 6-step long-term project. Name each work. Once complete, a published work can tick another long-term project clock related to the revolution, once per downtime (maximum of four such works may be in effective circulation). If you die or get imprisoned, each work adds two ticks.
playbook_ability_total_dedication_descri: When you roll a desperate action, you get +1d to your roll if you also take -1d to any resistance rolls against consequences from your action.
gatherinfo_what_do_they_care_about: What do they really care about?
playbook_radical_description: An Agitator — Incendiary In Every Sense
playbook_radical_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with persuasion or mayhem.
playbook_item_provocative_manifesto_desc: A short punchy document declaring the views, motives, and intentions of a political movement. Has the potential to incite a crowd, or to enrage the authorities.
playbook_item_nondescript_clothes_descri: An outfit of perfectly ordinary cut, for blending in with the crowd of whatever district you're in.
playbook_item_bandolier_description: A strap worn across the body, fitted with specially-padded pouches to hold three explosives or bombs. When you employ an item from the bandolier, choose one from the list (or one of your own custom-made explosives). During downtime, you automatically refill your bandoliers, so long as you have reasonable access to a supplier or workshop.
show_sparkmind_section: Show sparkmind assistant on character sheet
autopod_style: Style (Velvet or leather upholstery, wood detailing, chrome finish, racing stripe, etc)
playbook_swinger_description: A Wheeler And Dealer — The Life Of The Party
playbook_swinger_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with charm or quick-thinking.
playbook_ability_wing_it_description: Take 2 stress to roll your Sway rating while performing a different action. Use a free flashback to reveal who you convinced to teach you this particular technique (probably at a party).
playbook_ability_yeah_baby_description: When you agree to an NPC’s proposal, even though it complicates or counters the crew’s goals, everyone else on the crew marks 1 xp while you clear 3 stress.
playbook_ability_in_the_groove_descripti: Your dance moves are particularly compelling. When you take action while moving it on the dancefloor, take +1d and potency.
playbook_ability_side_hustles_descriptio: When you push yourself, you can also do one of the following: claim to be anyone and others will consider the possibility, no matter how outlandish — plunge blindly in an unexpected direction and find a new path.
playbook_ability_connected_description: During downtime, you may give yourself or another crew member +1 downtime action. You get +1 result level when you acquire an asset or reduce heat.
playbook_ability_party_animal_descriptio: When you indulge your vice, you may adjust the dice outcome by 1 or 2 (up or down). An ally who joins in your vice may do the same.
playbook_ability_twice_the_fun_descripti: There’s an alternate version of you in the resonance field, ghostly and glitched out. Are they you from the past, or future, or something or somewhere else? When you push yourself, you can also summon them to: do some spying for you—confuse or distract your enemies.
playbook_ability_smooth_description: Twice per score, you may use your mojo to resist a consequence of suspicion or social faux-pas, or to push yourself when talking your way out of a tight spot or driving under pressure.
playbook_item_fine_clothes_&_jewelry_des: A fabulous outfit with a flattering cut, in the latest style. Sure to impress. If you’re carrying this item as a second outfit to change into, it counts as 2 load.
playbook_item_fine_twoseat_autopod_descr: The latest model. Is it built for racing, impressing, or surprising your enemies?
playbook_item_invitation_to_the_party_de: Everybody knows it's not a party if you're not invited.
playbook_item_concealed_shooter_descript: A semi-automatic handgun with a modest calibre. It’s very difficult to detect on your person, even if you’re searched.
playbook_item_sleeping_pills_description: If someone takes a few of these pills they'll quickly fall unconscious for at least an hour. The victim’s sleep isn’t paranormal, but it is deep — they can only be roused with some effort.
faction_affiliation_info: As an operative you start play with a backing faction. Is it the Palace, Blackthorn Park, or another faction? They may give you a personal mission. Complete this personal mission to gain that faction’s prestige ability.
playbook_ability_infiltrator_description: Twice per score, you may use your precision to resist a consequence from detection or security measures, or to push yourself for a feat of athletics or stealth. When you attack from hiding, you get +1d.
playbook_ability_double_agent_descriptio: You are allowed a second backing faction (they must be unlocked with a project as normal). You gain potency when attempting to influence any of your backing factions.
playbook_ability_dead_drop_description: You have access to a Bound Resonance Entity that will leave up to 2 load of items anywhere you need it. You can flashback to requesting the item(s), left anywhere you choose, for free.
playbook_ability_echo_walker_description: When you push yourself, you can also disappear into the resonance field immediately. Reappear later, whereever you want (you have to be able to move there physically). When you re-appear you are so cold (level 1 harm) and something from the resonance field may notice/follow you (GM will tick a clock). You may resist these consequences.
playbook_ability_clean_description: Twice per score, you may use your precision to resist a consequence from detection or security measures, or to push yourself for a feat of athletics or stealth.
playbook_ability_wetwork_description: When you push yourself, you can also do one of the following: make an improbable shot at extreme distance or with extreme speed—perform a feat of athletics that verges on the superhuman.
playbook_ability_cipher_description: When you use a disguise, you get +1d to rolls to confuse or deflect suspicion. When you throw off your disguise, the resulting surprise gives you the initiative in the situation (and potency).
playbook_ability_sleeper_agents_descript: Once per score, pay 2 stress and nominate a minor NPC. They’ve been working for you this whole time.
playbook_ability_control_description: Choose one of your action ratings. When you lead a group action using that action, you can suffer only 1 stress at most regardless of the number of failed rolls, and you may count multiple 6s from different rolls as a critical.
playbook_operative_description: A Stealthy And Clandestine Espionage Professional
playbook_operative_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with stealth or subterfuge.
playbook_item_truth_serum_description: Delivers one dose of a truth serum. The victim becomes delirious and suggestible for up to an hour, open to answering all sorts of questions.
playbook_item_fine_sniper_rifle_descript: A high-powered sniper rifle complete with silencer. Deadly at long range, unwieldy in close quarters
playbook_item_tiny_tracking_device_descr: A small tracking device (adhesive and/or magnetic) and a handheld gadget that show the device's current location. Works reliably up to a distance of two city districts away.
playbook_item_fine_silenced_shooter_desc: A finely-made semi-automatic handgun with a modest calibre. Quiet as a whisper.
playbook_item_fine_disguise_description: A state-of-the-art disguise of one specific person. Includes clothing as well as a super-realistic latex mask and wig. Could fool their own family, assuming you're roughly the same height and build. If you’re carrying this item as a second outfit to change into, it counts as 2 load.
playbook_ability_precognition_descriptio: Two times per score you can assist a teammate without paying stress. Tell us how you prepared for this in advance.
playbook_ability_psychokinesis_descripti: When you push yourself, you can also do one of the following: levitate for a short time—violently push or pull objects through the air.
playbook_ability_extrasensory_perception: Twice per score, you may use your sixth sense to resist a paranormal consequence, or to push yourself when you deal with paranormal forces.
playbook_ability_forbidden_science_descr: You can use a downtime action to perform a paranormal experiment to manifest a supernatural effect or being. Gain one free downtime action to perform such experiments.
playbook_ability_resonance_projection_de: Pay 2 stress to become a radiant being of crackling energy. While in this mode you ignore all harm penalties (level 4 harm is still lethal), your physical attacks gain potency, and you can push yourself to shoot arcs of electroplasmic lightning. The projection drops at the end of the scene (or pay 2 stress to continue for another scene). When you drop the projection, take the level 2 harm Drained and the GM will tick a clock of their choice (you may resist these consequences).
playbook_ability_galaxy_brain_descriptio: When you drop Echo Projection, the GM no longer ticks a clock (you still take the Drained harm).
playbook_ability_medium_description: You can communicate with all paranormal entities, even those not present in the physical realm. Take +1d and potency when you do.
playbook_ability_parapsychology_descript: You're immune to the terror that paranormal entities inflict on sight. Take +1d to resistance rolls with Resolve. Take +1d when you gather info about the paranormal.
playbook_paranormalist_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with knowledge or paranormal power.
playbook_item_fine_resonance_gauge_descr: A handheld device that measures resonance in its vicinity. Can be used to detect paranormal activity and locate resonance entities.
playbook_item_resonance_accelerator_pack: A handheld particle-thrower connected to a backpack-sized resonance accelerator. Blasts a stream of highly focused, polarized electroplasmic energy. Suitable for grappling with a resonance entity and dragging it into a containment unit.
playbook_item_fine_echo_containment_unit: A device used to hold a single resonance entity for containment and safe transport. Designed for Class I - IV resonance entities. Not advised for Class V or above.
playbook_item_psychic_amplification_devi: An experimental piece of equipment that focuses the wearer's paranormal abilities. Also affords some measure of protection against paranormal assault. What does yours look like; is it a helmet, a circlet, a glove or gauntlet, or something else? Did you invent it yourself, or acquire it some other way?
playbook_item_hallucinogenic_pills_descr: Induces a psychedelic state, altering the user's fundamental perception of reality. They partially lose control of their body, becoming confused and disoriented (moderate harm, may be resisted). Some find that this state frees their true consciousness, allowing deep spiritual connection to take place; may improve the effect of actions relating to attunement.
playbook_ability_a_room_of_your_own_desc: You have your own secret little den. You can now put stacks into your bank. You have a pet. You can spend a downtime action to look after the pet (describe the lengths you go to), and mark 2 xp in a memory clock of your choice.
advanced_visual_sensors_description: Your eyes can switch to various visual modes, including night vision, heat vision, and ultra-zoom.
life_like_appearance_description: Utilizing the latest super-realistic latex, you are masterfully crafted to pass for a living being (unless closely scrutinized).
hidden_compartment_description: Your frame has a secret compartment that escapes even the most thorough search. Lead-lined to prevent x-ray scanning.
smokescreen_emitter_description: An emergency system that can exude a dark, acrid cloud of smoke — enough to fill a large room.
surveillance_hardware_description: The latest espionage equipment, including an ultra-sensitive microphone that can hear at long range or through walls, and tape-feed to record this audio.
jet_propulsion_description: Your frame includes jet boosters that provide a limited form of flight (either slow or temporary).
hull_blurb1: Spend a downtime action going ON PROGRAM. In this state you do the work assigned by your controller. The GM will tell you what did. Each downtime phase you skip this, tick the suspicion clock. When full, your owning faction will take steps against you, including cutting you off from their industrial-grade generator (see below).
hull_blurb2: Recharge your capacitors by connecting to an industrial-grade generator (downtime action). When you do this, clear 5 drain. When you mark your last drain box, you go ON PROGRAM immediately (the GM will tell you what you do). Deadlock a key as normal. If you have no keys yet, choose a robotic deadlock instead (brutal, detached, ruthless, or unstable) and mark it below.
memory_blurb: Whenever you would mark playbook xp, you can tick a memory clock instead . When the clock is full, fill in the memory. You also remember: One key of your choice, a human contact, and a special ability from another playbook.
memoryclock1: What was my name and heritage?
memory1_blurb: Add a former friend (choose from friends of other players), key, and special ability
memoryclock2: What was my background? Who or what did I love most in life?
memory2_blurb: Add a former friend (choose from rivals of other players), key, and special ability
memory3_blurb: Add a former friend (choose from friends of other players), key, and special ability
memoryclock4: What crime was I sentenced to be Reformed for?
memory4_blurb: Remember a rival (someone powerful and dangerous), key, and special ability
specialabilities_blurb: Whenever you fill a memory clock, choose another playbook and roll 1d8. Use your result to count down the list of abilities from the top, and take that one. If it involves special items, you get those too. How did you acquire these items?
markxp_blurb:
When you’ve completed all four memories, replace your first XP trigger with this one:

You worked to free yourself from your owning faction and controller, or you addressed a challenge with your humanity.
1_table_blurb:
GM and every player each table an opportunity, providing one or two of: a client; a target faction; and/or an operation type. Consider:
  • What score is my character interested in?
  • What’s best for the crew right now?
  • What would be interesting, funny, or chaotic?
2_roll_blurb:
Payout = Crew Tier roll + Target’s Tier

Roll payout for each tabled opportunity (tells you stacks as well as size/difficulty). For a claim score, stacks payout is halved (but not half the difficulty).
3_choose_blurb: Once you’ve chosen the score, flashback to arranging this score with the client. Gather information if you want, then decide an approach and opening gambit.
